item.title: NVIDIA, OpenAI Announce 'the Biggest AI Infrastructure Deployment in History'
item.description: OpenAI and NVIDIA announced a partnership that will scale OpenAI’s compute with at least 10 gigawatts of data centers powered by millions of GPUs.

item.title: How to watch ‘The Chosen Adventures,’ coming soon to Prime Video
item.description: The animated adventure comedy series from Ryan Swanson follows two friends who encounter a wise craftsman and teacher who helps them change the way they see the world.

item.title: Amazon shares vision for responsible AI and global connectivity at UN General Assembly
item.description: As world leaders gather for UNGA80, Amazon's Chief Global Affairs Officer discusses how Project Kuiper and responsible AI can address pressing global challenges.

item.title: How Amazon Pharmacy has helped customers save more than $100 million on prescription medications like GLP-1s and insulin
item.description: Amazon Pharmacy automatically applies manufacturer-sponsored coupons directly to eligible orders, making medications more affordable.

item.title: The UK’s ‘Goldilocks Moment for AI’: NVIDIA, UK and US Leaders Highlight AI Infrastructure Investments
item.description: NVIDIA founder and CEO Jensen Huang discussed the UK’s plans to become an AI superpower with UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, UK Secretary of State for Science, Innovation and Technology Liz Kendall, UK Secretary of State for Business and Trade Peter Kyle, and US Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick.

item.title: NVIDIA Blackwell: Born for Extreme-Scale AI Inference
item.description: NVIDIA Blackwell is the core of a system architecture designed to power AI factories that produce intelligence through inference.

item.title: Inside the world’s most powerful AI datacenter - The Official Microsoft Blog
item.description: This week we have introduced a wave of purpose-built datacenters and infrastructure investments we are making around the world to support the global adoption of cutting-edge AI workloads and cloud services. Today in Wisconsin we introduced Fairwater, our newest US AI datacenter, the largest and most sophisticated AI factory we’ve built yet. In addition to...

item.title: Microsoft leads shift beyond data unification to organization, delivering next-gen AI readiness with new Microsoft Fabric capabilities - The Official Microsoft Blog
item.description: We’re in a hinge moment for AI. The experiments are over and the real work has begun. Centralizing data, once the finish line, is now the starting point. The definition of “AI readiness” is evolving as increasingly sophisticated agents demand rich, contextualized data grounded in business operations to deliver meaningful results. What sets leaders apart...

item.title: A joint statement from Microsoft and OpenAI - The Official Microsoft Blog
item.description: Microsoft and OpenAI have signed a non-binding memorandum of understanding (MOU) for the next phase of our partnership. We are actively working to finalize contractual terms in a definitive agreement. Together, we remain focused on delivering the best AI tools for everyone, grounded in our shared commitment to safety.

item.title: How to watch ‘Harlan Coben’s Lazarus’ on Prime Video
item.description: Sam Claflin and Bill Nighy star in the mind-bending thriller series from ‘New York Times’ best-selling author Harlan Coben.

item.title: Everything to know about Prime Video’s biblical epic ‘House of David’ Season 2
item.description: The second season of the drama, which follows the aftermath of the battle between David and Goliath, and David’s rise to the throne, returns on October 5.

item.title: AlphaQubit tackles one of quantum computing’s biggest challenges
item.description: AlphaQubit is an AI-based decoder that identifies quantum computing errors with state-of-the-art accuracy.

item.title: OpenAI and NVIDIA Announce Strategic Partnership to Deploy 10 Gigawatts of NVIDIA Systems
item.description: OpenAI and NVIDIA today announced a letter of intent for a landmark strategic partnership to deploy at least 10 gigawatts of NVIDIA systems for OpenAI’s next-generation AI infrastructure to train and run its next generation of models on the path to deploying superintelligence.

item.title: NVIDIA Announces £2 Billion Investment in the United Kingdom AI Startup Ecosystem
item.description: NVIDIA today announced an investment of £2 billion in the U.K. market to catalyze the nation’s AI startup ecosystem and scale the next generation of globally transformative AI businesses.

item.title: NVIDIA and Intel to Develop AI Infrastructure and Personal Computing Products
item.description: NVIDIA (NASDAQ: NVDA) and Intel Corporation (NASDAQ: INTC) today announced a collaboration to jointly develop multiple generations of custom data center and PC products that accelerate applications and workloads across hyperscale, enterprise and consumer markets.

item.title: NVIDIA and United Kingdom Build Nation’s AI Infrastructure and Ecosystem to Fuel Innovation, Economic Growth and Jobs
item.description: NVIDIA today announced that it is investing in accelerating the AI industrial revolution in the United Kingdom, working with partners including CoreWeave, Microsoft and Nscale to build the nation’s next generation of AI infrastructure.

item.title: AlphaGenome: AI for better understanding the genome
item.description: Introducing a new, unifying DNA sequence model that advances regulatory variant-effect prediction and promises to shed new light on genome function — now available via API.

item.title: A catalogue of genetic mutations to help pinpoint the cause of diseases
item.description: New AI tool classifies the effects of 71 million ‘missense’ mutations Uncovering the root causes of disease is one of the greatest challenges in human genetics. With millions of possible...

item.title: AlphaProteo generates novel proteins for biology and health research
item.description: New AI system designs proteins that successfully bind to target molecules, with potential for advancing drug design, disease understanding and more.

item.title: AlphaEvolve: A Gemini-powered coding agent for designing advanced algorithms
item.description: New AI agent evolves algorithms for math and practical applications in computing by combining the creativity of large language models with automated evaluators

item.title: AI achieves silver-medal standard solving International Mathematical Olympiad problems

item.title: Millions of new materials discovered with deep learning
item.description: We share the discovery of 2.2 million new crystals – equivalent to nearly 800 years’ worth of knowledge. We introduce Graph Networks for Materials Exploration (GNoME), our new deep learning tool...

item.title: Accelerating fusion science through learned plasma control
item.description: Successfully controlling the nuclear fusion plasma in a tokamak with deep reinforcement learning

item.title: Blue Origin Completes 35th New Shepard Mission | Blue Origin
item.description: Blue Origin successfully completed its 35th New Shepard flight and 15th payload mission today from Launch Site One in West Texas.

item.title: Blue Alchemist Hits Major Milestone Toward Permanent and Sustainable Lunar Infrastructure | Blue Origin
item.description: Blue Origin's pioneering in-space resource utilization system, Blue Alchemist, has successfully completed its Critical Design Review, marking a transformative milestone toward humanity's permanent expansion beyond Earth.

item.title: The Mission: Blue Origin’s Mars Telecommunications Orbiter | Blue Origin
item.description: Built upon our existing and affordable Blue Ring platform, our Mars Telecommunications Orbiter is ready to support NASA’s Mars mission in 2028.
